hero-sub: Original compositions and arrangements for guitar
f1-text: I've been involved in music since the age of 9, and started writing my own compositions at 15. After graduating from music school as a classical guitarist, I continued to develop as a pianist and composer.
f2-text-p: In my creative practice, I combine influences from Japanese pop music, jazz, and romantic music, forming my own individual style.
about-text-1: I've been involved in music since the age of 9, and started writing my own compositions at 15. After graduating from music school as a classical guitarist, I continued to develop as a pianist and composer.
about-text-2: I participated in creating a song for the album Why don't you eat MONACA? and currently authored twelve original works and one arrangement. In my creative practice, I combine influences from Japanese pop music, jazz, and romantic music, forming my own individual style.
aside-li-6: A combination of acoustic and electronic instruments
aside-faq-a1: Yes — describe the project and deadlines, and we'll agree on the price.
aside-faq-q2: What genres do you work with?
aside-faq-a2: Primarily instrumental, jazz, and pop arrangements in a romantic aesthetic.
aside-faq-a3: Yes, I am open to collaboration.
arrangements-text: Description about guitar arrangements, sheet music ().
